column5: LOL. Let's rename this forum. The "Beer and DUI information board". :)
Canadians are all afraid to drive in the US now. :D
Canadians should be afraid to drive in the US. Lets face it aon Friday or Sat night there are a great many potential DUI's out on the streets
Don't get too sanctimonious, now. Believe me. There are Canadians driving while impaired all across Canada, too. Big Fish was making a wise crack.
[font color=green size=3][b]Then Americans should be afraid to drive,or boat in Canada, considering the locals impaired from eating those funny brownies.
>LOL. Let's rename this forum. The "Beer and DUI information >board". >:) > Now THAT is funny !!! I have seen those two questions posed seemingly a million times in the last 4 or 5 years. HAHAHAHAA
